channel.title: 8.0.x on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0 Is Available
item.description: The maintainers team is pleased to announce that PrestaShop 8.0 is officially available. PrestaShop 8, the first major version since the original release of PrestaShop 1.7.0 back in 2016, is an important milestone for the project. A significant cleanup has been performed in the codebase, with several internal components updated, modified or removed. PrestaShop 8 is also the projectâ€™s first company-neutral release, meaning that it no longer includes commercial products and services built-in.
